detail.content: New York University - Training                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   New York University           Skip to Content     Skip to Search     Skip to Navigation     Skip to Sub Navigation                                                            New York University                                                                                                                                                Home                                NYU Classes Upgrade                                     Training                                         FAQs                                                          Three Easy Ways to Get Training                          Online Training Modules   Self-paced, online training modules for Faculty, Students and Staff are now available. For more information, please visit the    NYU Classes Training and Support site .      Faculty and Staff   Visit the NYU Classes Getting Started Page    to setup your course sites and learn the basics of the new system.   Students   See an    overview of the new system  and find links to helpful documentation.         Individual and Small Group Consultations   Looking for individualized help for yourself or a small group of your colleagues? One-on-one and small group consultations can be scheduled with the NYU Classes support team.    Click here to schedule a time .     To learn about additional training opportunities at NYU Global Academic Centers, please contact    AskITS@nyu.edu .                                              NYU Footer                                  Stay Informed                                Provide Feedback            Ask ITS Knowledgebase                                                          Unless otherwise noted, all content copyright New York University. Please fill out Ask ITS Contact form to submit questions or feedback. Be sure to select "NYU Classes" as the Subject.      related pages            NYU Blackboard information        NYU Teaching and Learning Resources       NYU Classes Training and Support site       NYU Classes support in the ServiceLink knowledge base                     New walk-in support clinics now available    Walk-in support clinics are now available to assist you in the use of NYU Web Publishing and NYU Classes. The clinics are offered every Monday from 2-4pm at Bobst Library, room 509; no need to make an appointment! See the NYU Classes training page for additional support options.        The NYU Classes learning management system enables NYU faculty to use web-based collaborative and assessment technologies to enhance the teaching and learning experience. Instructors may use this service to design full-featured online course environments for the participants of their class. Participants may access course materials, collaborate with others, engage with interactive assessments and assignments, and track their progress in a course gradebook.    How to access NYU Classes   Eligible community members can access NYU Classes via the Course Sites channel within the NYUHome Academics tab ( home.nyu.edu/academics ). A valid NYU NetID and password are required to log into both NYUHome and NYU Classes.    Abu Dhabi community members can access NYU Classes via Academic Services . Students can also access NYU Classes via the Quicklinks menu in the Student Portal .    Terms of Use   To view the policies associated with NYU Classes, please see the NYU Classes Terms of Use .     Page last reviewed: January 27, 2015

Please fill out Ask ITS Contact form to submit questions or feedback. Be sure to select "NYU Classes" as the Subject.     related pages            NYU Blackboard information        NYU Teaching and Learning Resources       NYU Classes Training and Support site       NYU Classes support in the ServiceLink knowledge base                     New walk-in support clinics now available    Walk-in support clinics are now available to assist you in the use of NYU Web Publishing and NYU Classes. The clinics are offered every Monday from 2-4pm at Bobst Library, room 509; no need to make an appointment! See below for additional support options.      Online training modules   Self-paced, online training modules for faculty, students and staff are available via the NYU Classes Training and Support site .     Weekly walk-in support clinics   The NYU Classes service team now offers support clinics available in Bobst Library (70 Washington Square South) every Monday from 2-4pm in room 509. Drop by for in-person help from the Web Publishing team; no need to make an appointment!    Individual and small group consultations   Looking for individualized help for yourself or a small group of your colleagues? In addition to the above walk-in support clinics, one-on-one and small group consultations can be scheduled with the NYU Classes support team. Click here to schedule a time .    Training contact   If you would like to send a special training request or learn more about training options, please send email to nyu-classes-training-group@nyu.edu for assistance.    Other ITS training   To view other ITS training offerings, visit the ITS Training Page ( www.nyu.edu/its/training ).    Page last reviewed: January 23, 2015
